Definition.WordDefinition: Stevenson, AL (city, FIPS 73080) Location: 34.87061 N, 85.83310 W Population (1990): 2046 (888 housing units) Area: 12.8 sq km (land), 0.8 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 35772 Stevenson, WA (city, FIPS 67875) Location: 45.69362 N, 121.89316 W Population (1990): 1147 (457 housing units) Area: 3.1 sq km (land), 0.3 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 98648

Stevenson n 1: Scottish author (1850-1894) [syn: {Robert Louis Stevenson}, {Robert Louis Balfour Stevenson}] 2: United States politician and diplomat (1900-1968) [syn: {Adlai Stevenson}, {Adlai Ewing Stevenson}]
